http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 微量元素Hf消除FGH96合金中原始粉末颗粒边界组织机制的探讨
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 张义文1,2， 刘建涛1,2， 韩寿波1,2， 迟 悦1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 钢铁研究总院 高温材料研究所， 北京 100081
2. 高温合金新材料北京市重点实验室， 北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 粉末冶金高温合金中原始粉末颗粒边界组织（PPBS）由碳化物和少量碳氧化物组成。采用SEM、TEM以及AES等研究了粉末颗粒内、表面上以及合金中PPB上碳化物的结构和组成，依据热力学和扩散理论分析了Hf消除原始粉末颗粒边界组织（PPBS）的微观机制。结果表明：快速凝固粉末颗粒表面形成含有Ti、Nb、Cr、Mo、W的MC型亚稳定碳化物MC′，在HIP 过程中粉末颗粒表面上的MC′相转变成稳定的MC相，以及粉末颗粒内的Ti、C元素向烧结颈处扩散，HIP后在粉末颗粒边界上形成富Ti和Nb的MC型碳化物(Ti,Nb)C。加入微量Hf后，在粉末颗粒内形成了更多更稳定的含Hf的MC型碳化物(Ti,Nb,Hf)C，C、Ti被“绑定”在碳化物(Ti,Nb,Hf)C中，抑制了C、Ti向烧结颈处扩散，从而抑制了MC型碳化物在粉末颗粒边界上的析出。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Discussion on the mechanism of micro-element Hf eliminating PPBS in powder metallurgy superalloy FGH96
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The precipitates at prior particle boundary (PPB) are composed of carbide and small amount oxycarbide or oxide in PM superalloys. The composition and structure of carbide inside the powder, on the powder surface and on the PPB were investigated by SEM, TEM, AES techniques, etc. The mechanism of Hf eliminating prior particle boundary structure (PPBS) was discussed according to thermodynamics and diffusion theory. The results show that metastable MC type carbide MC′ rich in Ti, Nb, Cr, Mo and W elements forms on powder surface during atomization, the metastable MC′ carbide will transform into stable MC carbide during hot isostatic pressing (HIP) process. Ti and C inside powder particles will diffuse to sintering neck during HIP process, then stable MC carbide (Ti,Nb)C will form on powder particle boundaries. When micro-element Hf is added in, more and more stable MC type carbides containing Hf precipitate within powder particles, which means C and Ti elements are bound in (Ti,Nb,Hf)C carbides, suppressing the diffusion of C and Ti to sintering neck, and finally the precipitation of MC type carbides is inhibited.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 李亚蕾1， 谭敦强1,2， 杨 欣1， 陆 磊2， 陆德平2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 南昌大学 材料科学与工程学院，江西 南昌 330031
2. 江西省科学院 应用物理研究所，江西 南昌 330029
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用APT中湿掺杂仲钼酸铵((NH4)6Mo7O24)的方法，系统研究了不同Mo掺杂量对还原W粉形貌和粒度的影响。结果表明：在还原过程中，Mo经历了MoO3→MoO2→Mo的转变过程，以单质Mo的形式存在W粉中，使含Mo的W粉表面形貌不规则；随着Mo掺杂量的增加，W粉的平均粒径不断减小。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Influence?of doping Mo into APT on preparation of?tungsten powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of different Mo-doping on the morphology and grain size of tungsten powder were studied systematically by doping ammonium paramolybdate ((NH4)6Mo7O24) solution into APT. The results show that Mo experiences the transition process of MoO3→MoO2→Mo during the reduction process, and finally exists in the form of elemental Mo; Compared to tungsten powder without doping, the surface topography of Mo-contained tungsten powder becomes irregular; and the average grain size of tungsten powder decreases constantly with the increase of Mo doping content.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: Si含量对超音速气雾化Al-Si合金粉末性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 付军华1， 张少明1， 徐 骏1,2， 赵新明1,2， 盛艳伟1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 北京有色金属研究总院 国家有色金属复合材料工程技术研究中心，北京 100088
2. 北京康普锡威科技有限公司，北京 101400
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用超音速气雾化法制备了Si质量分数分别为11%、22%、27%、50%的4种Al-Si合金粉末，研究了其粒度分布、表面形貌、微观组织、相组成以及粒度对粉末相含量的影响。结果表明，超音速气雾化Al-Si合金粉末粒度呈双峰分布，平均粒度[D50]约为57 μm，粒度分布的几何标准偏差[δ]不大于1.38；粉末形貌呈球形或近球形，粉末表面有卫星球附着，Si含量的增加将导致粉末表面光洁度变差；粉末颗粒内部存在典型的3种凝固组织：枝晶状Al基体、Al-Si共晶组织以及初生Si组织；初生Si含量随着合金中Si含量的增加而增长，呈现由细颗粒到片状的生长规律；粉末粒度会影响相含量变化，Si质量分数大于11%时，粒径减小将导致共晶相增加。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effects of Si content on properties of Al-Si alloy powders produced by supersonic gas atomization
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Fine droplets of Al-11Si, Al-22Si, Al-27Si and Al-50Si (mass percent) were produced using supersonic high-pressure gas atomization. The particle size of powders was carried out by using an ASTM standard sieve with a vibratory shaker. Scanning electron microscopy (SEM), optical microscopy (OM) and X-ray diffraction (XRD) were used to the hierarchy of different microstructure. The [D50] (particle size on average) of Al-Si alloy powder is 57 μm, and the geometric standard deviation [δ] is less than or equal to 1.38, which is much lower than conventional gas atomization powder. The morphology of Al-Si powder is spherical or ellipsoidal sphere. There are fine particles adhered to the larger particles. The smooth finish of particles becomes worse with increase of Si content. Dendrite Al, eutectic and primary Si have been observed in the powders. The primary Si content increases and changes from particle to slice with the increase of Si content. The powder particle size has an effect on phase content, and the eutectic phase content increases with the decrease of particle size when the Si content is more than 11wt%.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 热等静压工艺参数对2A12粉末铝合金性能的影响研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 郎利辉， 王 刚， 布国亮， 姚 松， 续秋玉
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 北京航空航天大学 机械工程及自动化学院，北京 100191
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 对2A12铝合金粉末在不同的热等静压工艺参数下压制后的性能进行了初步的研究。结果表明：圆柱形试样的径向尺寸收缩要大于轴向尺寸的收缩；热等静压温度过高，会对零件的性能产生强烈的削弱作用，并且在其后的热处理过程中使微观组织产生裂纹和缺陷；通过调整热等静压工艺参数，可以改善材料的微观组织和力学性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Study on the effect of hot isostatic pressing process parameters on the properties of 2A12 aluminum alloy powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The properties of 2A12 aluminum alloy powder fabricated by hot isostatic pressing with different process parameters were studied. The results show that the axial shrinkage is smaller than radial shrinkage for cylindrical specimens. The properties of 2A12 aluminum alloy specimens will be sharply decreased when the temperature is too high during hot isostatic pressing, leading to cracks and defects occurring during subsequent heat treatment. The microstructure and mechanical properties of materials can be improved by adjusting the process parameters.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
郎利辉， 王 刚， 布国亮， 姚 松， 续秋玉. 热等静压工艺参数对2A12粉末铝合金性能的影响研究[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 19-23.
LANG Li-hui, WANG Gang, BU Guo-liang, YAO Song, XU Qiu-yu. Study on the effect of hot isostatic pressing process parameters on the properties of 2A12 aluminum alloy powder. , 2014, 24(05): 19-23.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 固溶时效工艺对TC4钛合金组织及性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 徐 坚1， 王文焱1,2， 张豪胤1， 谢敬佩1,2， 李洛利1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 河南科技大学 材料科学与工程学院，河南 洛阳 471003
2. 河南省有色金属材料科学与加工技术重点实验室， 河南 洛阳 471023
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用冷等静压、真空烧结的方法制备TC4钛合金，研究了不同固溶温度和时效温度对TC4钛合金组织及性能的影响。结果表明：冷等静压、真空烧结的方法制备的TC4粉末钛合金的抗拉强度可达852 MPa，伸长率为16%；随着固溶温度的提高，钛合金的抗拉强度提高，伸长率降低，而随着时效温度的提高，抗拉强度降低，伸长率提高。在960 ℃×30 min固溶、470 ℃×4 h时效时，合金的抗拉强度达到1 078 MPa，伸长率达到11%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of solution aging treatment on microstructure and properties of TC4 titanium alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：TC4 titanium alloy powder was prepared with the method of cold isostatic pressing and vacuum sintering. By adopting different solution temperature and aging temperature, the effect of heat treatment process on microstructure and properties of TC4 powder metallurgy titanium alloy was studied. The results show that tensile strength and elongation of TC4 powder metallurgy titanium alloy can reach 852 MPa and 16%, respectively. With the improvement of solid solution temperature, the tensile strength increases and the elongation decreases. With the improvement of aging temperature, the tensile strength decreases and the elongation increases. When solid solution treated at 960 ℃ for 30 min and aged at 470 ℃ for 4 h, tensile strength of the alloy reaches 1 078 MPa, and the elongation reaches 11%.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
徐 坚， 王文焱 ， 张豪胤， 谢敬佩 ， 李洛利. 固溶时效工艺对TC4钛合金组织及性能的影响[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 29-32.
XU Jian, WANG Wen-yan,, ZHANG Hao-yin, XIE Jing-pei,, LI Luo-li. Effect of solution aging treatment on microstructure and properties of TC4 titanium alloy. , 2014, 24(05): 29-32.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 高Dy含量烧结Nd-Fe-B的晶界扩散处理研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 李 建1,2， 周 磊2， 刘 涛2， 喻晓军2， 李 波1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 钢铁研究总院，北京 100081
2. 中国钢研科技集团公司安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 101318
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了晶界扩散处理对高Dy含量烧结Nd-Fe-B磁体性能和结构的影响。经蒸镀渗Dy晶界扩散处理，高Dy含量Nd-Fe-B磁体的矫顽力从1 713 kA/m提高至2 161 kA/m，而剩磁和最大磁能积基本没有下降，处理后磁体内Dy平均质量分数仅增加0.30%。不同深度片层分析表明，虽然磁体近表面片层比中心片层的Dy含量高，但是片层间矫顽力相差较少，而且所有片层的矫顽力均远高于未处理磁体片层的矫顽力。电子探针Dy元素面分布结果显示，在未处理高Dy含量磁体的晶界与主相中均存在Dy元素富集区且富集浓度较低，而经扩散处理后，晶界富Nd相中的Dy富集区浓度及所占比例明显提高；包括磁体芯部在内，磁体内大部分角隅处富Nd相内Dy含量明显增加，进一步提高了高Dy含量磁体内部各处的矫顽力。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Investigation of grain boundary diffusion on Nd-Fe-B sintered magnet with high Dy content
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of grain boundary diffusion treatment on magnetic properties and structures of sintered Nd-Fe-B magnet with high Dy content was investigated. Using Dy vapor sorption process, the coercivity of high Dy content magnet increases from 1 713 kA/m to 2 161 kA/m without decrement of remanence or maximum energy product. Dy content of the whole magnet merely increased 0.30% (mass percent) after treatment. Further investigation of the flakes at different depths of magnet reveals that the coercivity of the flakes is similar although the Dy content in subsurface flakes is more than that in central flakes. Moreover, the coervity of all flakes is much higher than untreated ones. According to the EPMA mapping images, Dy is dispersed not only in the grain boundary but also among the main phases, and concentration of Dy-rich area is lower in untreated sample. However, for the treated samples, the concentration and the scale of Dy-rich area in grain boundary are both much larger than those of untreated ones. The coercivity of the flakes at different depth is all greatly increased due to remarkable Dy increase among the most of Nd-rich triple junction grain phases.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
李 建 ， 周 磊， 刘 涛， 喻晓军， 李 波. 高Dy含量烧结Nd-Fe-B的晶界扩散处理研究[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 33-37.
LI Jian,, ZHOU Lei, LIU Tao, YU Xiao-jun, LI Bo. Investigation of grain boundary diffusion on Nd-Fe-B sintered magnet with high Dy content. , 2014, 24(05): 33-37.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料的制备工艺和性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 郝世明1,2， 谢敬佩3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 河南科技大学 物理工程学院，河南 洛阳 471023
2. 郑州大学 物理工程学院，河南 郑州 450001
3. 河南科技大学 材料科学与工程学院，河南 洛阳 471023
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用粉末冶金法制备SiCp/6061Al复合材料，研究热压温度、球磨工艺参数和SiC颗粒（SiCp）体积分数对SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料性能的影响，测试其力学性能及物理性能，用扫描电镜对材料的微观组织和断口进行观察。结果表明：540 ℃是较适合的热压温度；随着SiCp含量的增加，复合材料的致密度、热膨胀系数下降，抗拉强度先提高后迅速降低。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Study on preparation and properties of silicon carbide particulate reinforced aluminum matrix composites
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：To study the effects of hot pressing temperature, milling process parameters and SiCp volume fraction on SiC particle reinforced aluminum composites, the SiCp/6061Al composites were prepared by powder metallurgy routes. The mechanical and physical properties of the composite were tested, and the microstructure and fracture were observed using scanning electron microscope. The results show that 540 ℃ is the suitable hot pressing temperature; with SiCp content increasing, the relative density and thermal expansion coefficient of the composite decrease, and the tensile strength increases firstly and then decreases rapidly.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
郝世明 ， 谢敬佩. SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料的制备工艺和性能研究[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 38-43.
HAO Shi-ming ,, XIE Jing-pei . Study on preparation and properties of silicon carbide particulate reinforced aluminum matrix composites. , 2014, 24(05): 38-43.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 超细Cu粉在导电浆料中的烧结性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 中国有色桂林矿产地质研究院有限公司，广西 桂林 541004
2. 国家特种矿物材料工程技术研究中心，广西 桂林 541004
3. 广西超硬材料重点实验室， 广西 桂林， 541004
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为了得到Cu导电浆料所需的纳米金属粉，通过直流电弧等离子法制备纳米Cu粉，利用X射线衍射(XRD)、FESEM等测试手段对Cu粉的晶体结构、形貌进行表征。以丙烯酸树脂、乙基纤维素和松油醇为有机载体，采用超细Cu粉（质量分数70%）为导电相配制了导电浆料，研究了不同烧结温度（450～600 ℃）及烧结时间（15～60 min）下Cu导电浆料的导电特性及形貌变化。结果表明，烧结工艺对导电膜层的导电性能影响较大，随着烧结温度的升高和保温时间的延长，浆料层的导电能力增强，方阻逐渐减小；600 ℃烧结60 min时，浆料方阻最小，可达到14.8 mΩ/□。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Study on sintering performance of ultrafine copper powder in conductive paste
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to obtain the metal ultrafine copper conductor paste, the ultrafine copper powder was prepared by direct current arc plasma evaporation method, the crystalline structure and morphology of copper powder were characterized by X-ray diffraction(XRD), field emission scanning electron microscope (FESEM). With acrylic resin, ethyl cellulose and terpineol as organic carrier, ultrafine copper powder (mass percent of 70%) as conductive phase, the copper conducting pastes were prepared. The conductive properties and morphology of pastes under different sintering temperature (450~600 ℃) and holding time (15~60 min) were studied. The results show that the sintering process has a great influence on the conductive properties of the paste. As the sintering temperature and holding time increase, the square resistance of conductive copper paste reduces gradually, and the conductivity of the paste is enhanced. The conductive copper paste sintered at 600 ℃ for 60 min has the square resistance of 14.8 m Ω /□.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
雷晓旭 ， 刘文平 ， 秦海青 ， 林 峰 ， 张振军 ， 张健伟 . 超细Cu粉在导电浆料中的烧结性能研究[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 24-28.
LEI Xiao-xu,,, LIU Wen-ping,,, QIN Hai-qing,,, LIN Feng,, , ZHANG Zhen-jun,,, ZHANG Jian-wei,,. Study on sintering performance of ultrafine copper powder in conductive paste. , 2014, 24(05): 24-28.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 放电等离子烧结制备储氢合金的应用研究现状
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 董小平， 杨丽颖， 庞艳荣， 李志远， 王 青
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 河北大学 质量技术监督学院， 河北 保定 071002
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了放电等离子烧结制备储氢合金的可行性，从La-Mg-Ni系、Mg基、Ti-V基合金的微观结构及其吸放氢性能等角度综述了放电等离子烧结在储氢合金中的应用研究进展，并指出储氢合金吸放氢性能的改善原因在于适当温度的放电等离子烧结促进了合金中新相的形成，控制了合金晶粒尺寸。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research status of application of spark plasma sintering on the preparation of hydrogen storage alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The feasibility of hydrogen storage alloy prepared by spark plasma sintering (SPS) was introduced. Research progress in the application of SPS on preparation of hydrogen storage alloy was summarized according to the microstructure and hydrogen absorption/desorption properties of La-Mg-Ni system, Mg-based and Ti-V based alloy. It was pointed out that the improvement of hydrogen absorption/desorption properties of the alloy was attributed to the fact that SPS at appropriate temperature could promote the formation of new phase in hydrogen storage alloy and control the grain size of the alloy.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
董小平， 杨丽颖， 庞艳荣， 李志远， 王 青. 放电等离子烧结制备储氢合金的应用研究现状[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 44-47.
DONG Xiao-ping, YANG Li-ying, PANG Yan-rong, LI Zhi-yuan, WANG Qing. Research status of application of spark plasma sintering on the preparation of hydrogen storage alloy. , 2014, 24(05): 44-47.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 浅谈粉末冶金制品与汽车零件市场
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 颜 炼， 李森蓉， 周许林
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 武汉钢铁集团公司研究院，湖北 武汉 430080
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 近年来，汽车制造业的发展带动了粉末冶金的发展。简述了粉末冶金产品的技术工艺特点、新材料制品在汽车工业的应用情况，并对高附加值的粉末冶金零件生产的发展方向提出建议。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Discussion of the powder metallurgy products and the auto parts market
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In recent years, the development of auto industry drives the development of powder metallurgy. The technical characteristics of powder metallurgy products, as well as the application of new material products in auto industry were briefly introduced. The development trend of high value-added powder metallurgy parts production was also suggested.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
颜 炼， 李森蓉， 周许林. 浅谈粉末冶金制品与汽车零件市场[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 54-58.
YAN Lian, LI Sen-rong, ZHOU Xu-lin. Discussion of the powder metallurgy products and the auto parts market. , 2014, 24(05): 54-58.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: UG_CAE技术在同步器齿毂全整形模具设计中的运用
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 蒋 政
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 重庆华孚工业股份有限公司，重庆 400038
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 随着我国汽车行业由低端市场向高端市场的转变，汽车零部件的精度要求日益提高，以保证相关力学和物理性能；装配件之间的配合特性也面临了新的要求，如同步器齿毂与齿套配合后的相对滑动应平稳顺畅，不得有卡滞现象的出现，以保证汽车在行驶过程中换挡顺畅。为了满足这一要求，同步器齿毂与齿套的尺寸精度，如齿形、齿向以及周节误差等必须精确控制，以保证恰当的装配间隙以及间隙的均匀性，不得有间隙的突变性。这往往导致需要经过多次试验后才能满足产品设计要求，不仅浪费资源，增加成本，使产品上量周期长，而且大大削弱了产品竞争力。运用UG_CAE技术，预期整形方式的选择对带台同步器齿毂变形的影响，缩短了产品开发周期，保证了产品质量。
keywords_cn: 关 键 词： CAE技术 全整形模具 缩短产品开发周期 保证实物质量
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Application of UG_CAE technique during the whole sizing die design for synchronizer gear hub
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：With the low-end market to high-end market transformation of automobile industry in China, the precision requirement of auto parts is also increased to ensure the mechanical and physical properties. Coordination characteristics among assembly parts is also facing new requirements, for example, the relative sliding between the synchronizer gear hub and tooth sleeve should be smooth, without clamping stagnation phenomenon, to ensure the smooth shifting in the car running process. In order to meet this requirement, the size precision of synchronizer gear hub and tooth sleeve, such as tooth shape, tooth and pitch error, has to be controlled precisely to ensure the appropriate assembly clearance and its uniformity. It often needs more than once experiments to meet the requirements of product design, leading to waste of resources, increased costs and long cycle of products, and then the competitiveness of products is greatly weakened. Using UG_CAE technique, the influence of shaping modes on the deformation of synchronizer gear hub was expected, the product development cycle was shortened, and the product quality was ensured.
keywords_en: Key words: The CAE technique 、Whole size die 、The production development cycle、Physical quality
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
蒋 政. UG_CAE技术在同步器齿毂全整形模具设计中的运用[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 59-62.
JIANG Zheng. Application of UG_CAE technique during the whole sizing die design for synchronizer gear hub. , 2014, 24(05): 59-62.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 基于Cult3D的粉末冶金齿轮成形模具虚拟装配
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 朱小龙， 王君泽， 刘 宇
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 南通大学，江苏 南通 226019
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为实现粉末冶金齿轮成形模具的网络交互展示，方便用户对模具的了解和维修，采用SolidWorks软件进行三维造型，通过Cult3D平台，在网络上交互、动态地展示粉末冶金齿轮成形模具的工作原理及装配关系，实现了粉末冶金齿轮成形模具在网络环境下虚拟装配的动态交互展示。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Virtual assembly of powder metallurgy gear forming mould based on Cult3D
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to realize interactive display of the powder metallurgy gear forming mould on web, and make comprehension and repair of the mould become more convenient for users, interactive and dynamic display of operating principle and assembly relation for the powder metallurgy gear forming mould on the network was provided by 3D model of the mould with the software of SolidWorks and Cult3D. The dynamic interactive display of virtual assembly for the powder metallurgy gear forming mould was realized.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
朱小龙， 王君泽， 刘 宇. 基于Cult3D的粉末冶金齿轮成形模具虚拟装配[J]. , 2014, 24(05): 63-67.
ZHU Xiao-long, WANG Jun-ze, LIU Yu. Virtual assembly of powder metallurgy gear forming mould based on Cult3D. , 2014, 24(05): 63-67.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 3种特殊微结构WC-Co硬质合金的研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 雷纯鹏1,2， 赵勇军2， 刘 刚2， 唐建成1

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研发WC-Co硬质合金新型的粉末制备方法和烧结技术以开发综合性能优良的硬质合金材料受到了广泛的重视，但关于粉末形貌结构对材料性能的影响还缺乏深入的研究。本文综述了粉末的形貌结构与3种特殊微结构硬质合金，超细/纳米结构硬质合金、中/粗晶粒硬质合金、板晶硬质合金的应用研究进展。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research progress of WC-Co cemented carbides with three kinds of special microstructure
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Research on powder preparation methods and sintering technologies for WC-Co cemented carbides with excellent performance has received wide attention, however, the influence of powder morphologies on properties of cemented carbides is also a lack of in-depth study. The powder morphologies, application and preparation of WC-Co cemented carbides with special microstructures, such as ultrafine/nano structure cemented carbide, middle/coarse grain cemented carbide and plate-like grain cemented carbide, were reviewed.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 科学家合成多种有序介孔沸石材料
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: （编辑部摘自《中国科学报》2014-07-01）
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 科技前沿
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 上海交通大学金属基复合材料国家重点实验室车顺爱课题组与瑞典科学家合作，在合成有序介孔沸石材料方面取得突破性成果。相关成果发表于《自然——通讯》杂志。沸石分子筛材料具备有序的微孔结构、大的比表面积、较高的水热和热稳定性、丰富的骨架酸中心等优异性能，因此在工业催化等领域得到广泛应用。在常规分子筛材料中，狭小且均一的微孔孔道结构（小于2 nm）在择形催化和吸附等方面表现卓越，但在针对大分子的催化反应中却一筹莫展。制备具有介孔结构（孔径大于2 nm）的沸石材料，成为解决这一难题的有效途径。借助超分子自组装水热合成有序的介孔沸石材料被认为是最有效的方法，但迄今取得的进展甚微。为此，车顺爱课题组设计了一系列的新型有机两亲性分子，并以其为模板，在水热条件下合成了多种具有有序介孔结构的MFI型沸石材料。据了解，该研究的核心是在常规的表面活性剂疏水链端引入芳香基团，通过分子间的π-π堆积增强疏水作用力，进一步稳定胶束和沸石骨架结构。所制备的介孔沸石材料具有很好的多级孔特征，利于大分子自由进出沸石内部参与相关催化反应，有效解决了物质在孔道内的传输和扩散限制。专家表示，该研究引入的合成策略及相关的结构导向机理研究，大大扩展了介孔沸石的制备途径，为今后介孔沸石材料的合成提供了建设性的指导，更有助于加深对有机客体分子如何导向形成无机骨架结构的认识。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation: （编辑部摘自《中国科学报》0-07-0）. 科学家合成多种有序介孔沸石材料[J]. 粉末冶金工业, 2014, 24(05): 53-53.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 美国国家航空和宇宙航行局完成增材制造的火箭发动机喷嘴试验
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 萧玉麟
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 信息摘译自：Powder Metallurgy Review/ ipmd.net e-neswletter 2014-09-09
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 国国家航空和宇宙航行局报道，由于美国亚拉巴马州亨茨维尔的马歇尔宇宙航行中心的帮助，迄今为止最复杂的增材制造的火箭发动机零件试验获得成功。增材制造（AM）工艺使美国国际航空和宇宙航行局的设计师们得以用40 个单独的喷射元素生产1个单一的喷嘴部件，而不是一一单造。采用传统的制造方法，需要163个单独零件一一做成，然后再组装，但用AM技术，仅用一两个零件，省时又省钱，还使工程师们可以制造更多的零件以提高火箭发动机的性能与减少失效倾向。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 电子装置面板组合及其制造方法
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 刘曼朗 供稿
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 一种电子装置面板组合制造方法，通过一成形装置实现，包括1公模及1母模。该制造方法包括以下步骤：将1前墙架置于公模内；将前墙架吸附固定于公模；接合公模与母模；在母模的模腔内注入塑胶原料，在前墙架上贴附形成塑胶面板；相对移开公模与母模；释放对前墙架的吸附及顶出前墙架与塑胶面板。本发明同时提供了一种电子装置面板组合。本发明实施方式中的电子装置面板组合中的塑胶面板直接注射成形于前墙架，这种方式制成的面板组合结构稳定，不易变形，可节省组装制造成本。(专利公开号：CN102847953A；公开日：2013-01-02；申请人：鸿富锦精密工业（深圳）有限公司，鸿海精密工业股份有限公司；发明人：叶锦文，肖 扬)一种球形纳米钨粉的制备方法 本发明公开一种采用高频Ar+NH3+H2混合气等离子体直接还原APT(仲钨酸铵)1步制备球形纳米钨粉的方法。在高频等离子体装置中，中心气和边气采用Ar，载气采用NH3和H2，建立持续稳定运行的高频Ar+NH3+H2混合气等离子体。原料APT通过加料器在载气带动下加入等离子体中，在高反应活性Ar+NH3+H2混合气等离子体气氛下被1步还原为金属钨，经后续冷却、收集得到球形纳米钨粉。Ar+NH3+H2混合气等离子体的优点是弧柱体长而粗，柱体饱满，尾焰无缺口，克服了普通高频Ar+H2等离子体弧柱体收缩、尾焰存在缺陷和反应时间短的问题，延长了物料在等离子体弧中的停留时间，强化了APT还原过程，得到了球形纳米钨粉。产品可用于电真空阴极材料、热喷涂以及粉末冶金领域。(专利公开号：CN102847953A；公开日：2013-01-02；申请人：中国科学院过程工程研究所；发明人：袁方利，张海宝，白柳杨，等)铝散热器低温钎焊用无铅焊膏及制备方法和其应用 一种铝散热器低温钎焊用无铅焊膏及制备方法和其用途，该焊膏由质量分数为85%～90%的焊锡合金粉和10%～15%的助焊剂均匀混合制成。其中的焊锡合金粉，按质量分数由54.0%～60.0%的Bi、0.5%～6.0%的Zn、0.5%～2.0%的Ni、0.05%～0.50%的Re和余量Sn组成；其中的助焊剂，按质量分数由10%～20%的活性剂、1%～10%的成膏剂、1%～10%的润湿剂、2%～10%的触变剂和余量溶剂混合而成。制备时，先按焊锡合金粉比例所需取料熔炼制得合金；然后用雾化法制得合金粉末，再经筛选制得焊锡合金粉；同时取料制得助焊剂；最后将制得的焊锡合金粉85%～90%和助焊剂10%～15%，混合，搅拌均匀，制得铝散热器低温钎焊用无铅焊膏。其特别适用于电脑CPU铝散热器低温钎焊用无铅焊膏。(专利公开号：CN102848093A；公开日：2013-01-02；申请人：北京有色金属与稀土应用研究所；发明人：周万盛，张国清，高念忠，等)射嘴头连体射料管及其加工方法 本发明公开了射嘴头连体射料管及其加工方法。所述射嘴头连体射料管包括1射料管体，其前端形成射料嘴，射料嘴前端面设有复合面，复合面上复合有1合金层，包含Fe、W、Co、Cr和Si。所述射嘴头连体射料管加工方法包括：步骤1，预备合金粉末和射料管体，所述合金粉末材料包含Fe、W、Co、Cr和Si，射料管体前端形成射料嘴，射料嘴前端面设有复合面；步骤2，用于将合金粉末复合至射料嘴复合面形成合金层。它具有如下优点：合金层材料包含Fe、W、Co、Cr和Si，并复合至射料嘴成合金层，增加射料嘴抗撞击、耐高温、耐磨、抗腐蚀性能。（专利公开号：CN102847912A；公开日：2013-01-02；申请人：厦门市兴鹭港压铸机配件有限公司；发明人：范辉云，童晓冰）采用粉末冶金的硅真空固态提纯方法 本发明公开了一种采用粉末冶金的硅真空固态提纯方法，包括：1)将粉状的硅料压铸成块状，放入真空炉或不适宜放置粉料的设备中，抽真空，加热到500～1 400 ℃，并保温5～25 h；2)冷却至室温后，将硅料取出，破碎、酸洗，得到提纯的硅。本发明可以避免在抽真空过程中造成硅料的损失以及硅粉对炉内和真空系统的污染，影响真空熔炼设备的寿命，而且通过采用粘结剂，有助于硅中杂质的分离，达到提纯的目的。（专利公开号：CN102862988A；公开日：2013-01-09；申请人：上海普罗新能源有限公司；发明人：史 珺）多轴式粉末冶金注射成形机 本发明公开了一种适于生产高精密度、三维形状复杂的粉末冶金产品的多轴式粉末冶金注射成形机。其主要包括：1机座、1主板、4组导模装置、1“十”字滑槽模具总成、1注射装置总成。4组导模装置安装在机器的正面上并相互连接。滑块模具置入“十”字模架的滑槽中，并与导模装置的曲轴连杆机构连接，藉由气缸及曲轴连杆机构的连动而在滑槽中作往复直线滑动，完成关模和开模的功能。液压缸与曲轴连杆机构连接，对有需要的模具施加额外的锁模力。其专用模具具有突破性的多滑块模具结构，多方向开模，超越传统模具的限制，能生产结构复杂、精度要求高的粉末冶金制品，在降低成本，大幅提升产能的同时确保产品质量的稳定。（专利公开号：CN102886518A；公开日：2013-01-23；申请人：刘 亚）

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 近期日本3个主要的粉末冶金企业发布的报告都表明：在日元贬值、世界经济增长、日本政府即将提高零售税、以及日本国内市场需求增长的背景下，2013财政年度（2013年4月1日—2014年3月31日）日本3个主要的粉末冶金企业的销售额都实现了增长。2013财政年度，日立化工集团所属的功能材料和高级制品与系统部门的销售额为4 937.66亿日元（48.35亿美元），比上年增长了6.3%；综合营业利润达277.25亿日元（2.714亿美元），比上年增长了17.9%。2013财政年度日立化工集团销售额的增长可以被归因于其在国外的生产工厂增加了注射成形产品、摩擦材料和汽车制造用粉末冶金零件的生产，另其对业务领域进行了调整，包括：2013年4月1日将新神户电机有限公司转让给了日立化学工业公司，以及吸收日立粉末冶金公司进入日立化学工业公司，以期提高对汽车零件业务的管理效率。日立化工集团高级制品与系统部门的业务包括摩擦材料和粉末冶金零件，2013财政年度其销售额达到2 347.11亿日元（22.98亿美元），比上年增长了6.3%，其增长可归因于日本和北美洲市场的需求增长。日立化工集团预计，2015年3月到期的下一个财政年度，日立化工集团的销售额将达到5 250亿日元（51.4亿美元），比2013财政年度增长约6.0%。2013财政年度，住友电子工业有限公司的销售额达到了25 697.79亿日元（251.61亿美元），比上年增长了18.9%；营业利润达到了1 200.58亿日元（17.56亿美元），比上年增长了56.3%。住友电子工业有限公司所属的工业材料和其他部门的规模在住友电子工业有限公司位列第3，排在前2位的部门分别是汽车、环境与能源部门。住友电子工业有限公司所属的工业材料和其他部门的产品包括：硬质合金、粉末冶金零件、钨、钼、重金属、热管理材料、陶瓷、金刚石工具等，2013财政年度其销售额达到了3 032.99亿日元（29.7亿美元），比上年增长了11.2%，其中粉末冶金零件的销售额达到了503亿日元（4.925亿美元），比上年增长了20.6%；硬质合金产品的销售额达到了829亿日元（8.118亿美元），比上年增长了16.9%。住友电子工业有限公司预计，2014财政年度，工业材料和其他部门的销售额将达到3 300亿日元（33亿美元），将比2013财政年度增长9%，2014财政年度住友电子工业有限公司所有部门的销售总额将增长5%。2013财政年度，三菱材料有限公司的销售总额达到了14 147.96亿日元（138.93亿美元），比上年增长了9.9%；营业利润达到662.81亿日元（6.51亿美元），比上年增长了26.3%。2013财政年度三菱材料有限公司最成功的部门是粘合剂部和铜部，这2个部门的销售额分别比上年增长了18.4%和11.8%。2013财政年度三菱材料有限公司所属的高级材料和工具部门的销售额达到了1 336亿日元（13.12亿美元），比上年增长了6.8%；营业利润达到140亿日元（1.37亿美元），比上年增长了30.7%。其业务领域包括：硬质合金工具、结构粉末冶金零件和轴承。2014年初，三菱材料有限公司宣布：三菱材料有限公司已经将三菱材料有限公司超合金公司51%的股份出售给了日立金属有限公司，三菱材料有限公司超合金公司将由三菱材料有限公司与日立金属有限公司共同管理，三菱材料有限公司生产的超合金可以被应用于飞机发动机、工业用燃气轮机和汽车。三菱材料有限公司有关方面表示：与日立金属有限公司建立合资企业将使三菱材料有限公司高级材料和工具部门更专注于在全球处于发展中的使用粉末冶金结构零件和硬质合金工具的汽车制造行业等市场。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation: 孙世杰. 日本粉末冶金企业受益于日本和全球经济增长[J]. 粉末冶金工业, 2014, 24(05): 23-23.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 美国ExOne公司开发出可应用于三维打印的Inconel 625合金
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 孙世杰
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 信息摘译自《金属粉末报告》
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: Inconel 625合金通常被应用于航空、化学和能源等市场，具体应用的领域有：燃气轮机叶片、过滤和分离设备、热交换器和铸造制品等。由于具有良好的抗氧化和耐腐蚀性能，该材料在高压和很大的温度范围内能够保持高强度。ExOne公司是一个制造三维打印设备和三维打印产品的美国公司，目前Inconel 625合金材料已经能够在ExOne公司开发的M-Flex和X1-Lab三维打印机上使用，ExOne公司在2014年6月将Inconel 625镍基合金推向市场。ExOne公司的首席技术官Rick Lucas说：“我们开发的Inconel 625合金的相对密度达到99%以上，这进一步表明，将ExOne公司开发的粘结剂喷射技术应用于三维打印行业是经济合算的。与其他的一些三维金属打印技术相比，在单位时间里，ExOne公司开发的设备打印出金属的量更多，并且可以使用更灵活，我们相信我们的技术拥有直接打印出高密度金属制品的能力，使我们面对金属加工企业和其他三维金属打印技术，拥有更大的竞争优势。”美国ExOne公司有关方面表示：为了扩大三维打印技术的应用，ExOne公司计划增加可用于三维打印生产的金属产品，目前有包括钛在内的几种金属，在ExOne公司所属的材料应用实验室正处于不同的开发阶段，ExOne公司制定的目标是每6个月推出一些可用于三维打印行业生产的材料。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation: 孙世杰. 美国ExOne公司开发出可应用于三维打印的Inconel 625合金[J]. 粉末冶金工业, 2014, 24(05): 47-47.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 指方向绘发展蓝图  定目标谋振兴伟业——鞍钢重型机械有限责任公司冶金粉材厂
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 孙颖
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 鞍钢重型机械有限责任公司冶金粉材厂
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn:
鞍钢重型机械有限责任公司冶金粉材厂是我国第一家专业生产水雾化铁粉的企业，目前产销量位居国内同行业榜首。该厂成立于1986年，隶属于鞍山钢铁集团公司。
【建厂历史背景】上世纪70年代，我国钢铁粉末生产十分落后,1984年经冶金工业部与国家经委、机械工业部共同商研，将南京粉末冶金厂引进的德国曼内斯曼水雾化粉末制造技术，转交给鞍山钢铁公司继续执行。1986年，我国第一家水雾化铁粉专业生产厂在鞍钢建成投产，当时设计年生产能力为2000吨。
【企业简介】鞍钢冶金粉材厂坐落于美丽的钢都——鞍山，厂区占地面积80000平方米，现有职工273人，工程技术人员45人，其中高级职称13人，中级职称32人。拥有专利项目5项，其中“水雾化扩散合金粉及其制造方法”获国家第二十届全国发明展览会银奖，“一种汽车发动机专用合金钢粉的生产方法”获第七届国际发明展览会暨国际教学新仪器和新设备展览会上获银奖；拥有实用技术5项；拥有专有技术11项。
鞍钢冶金粉材厂主要生产水雾化纯铁粉、合金铁粉、无偏析混合粉、易切削铁粉、焊条粉、阀座粉等六大系列上百个品种，产品主要应用于生产汽车、摩托车、航天、农机、家用电气等零配件制造业。产品销售遍及全国一百多座城市，合作伙伴达360余家，在国内建立了完善的销售网络和服务体系，水雾化铁粉国内市场占有率已达40%以上。目前，产能及市场占有率在国内排名第一，现任中国钢结构协会粉末冶金分会理事长单位。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation: 孙颖.     指方向绘发展蓝图  定目标谋振兴伟业——鞍钢重型机械有限责任公司冶金粉材厂[J]. 粉末冶金工业, 2014, 24(05): 72-73.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 铁基粉末冶金齿轮件的感应热处理
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 马生荣
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 连云港东睦新材料有限公司，江苏 连云港 222047
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了铁基粉末冶金齿轮件感应热处理设备的选择以及淬、回火参数对粉末冶金齿轮件产品质量的影响。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Induction heat treatment of ferrous powder metallurgy gear parts
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The selection of induction heat treatment equipment for ferrous powder metallurgy gear parts, and the effects of quenching and tempering parameters on the gear quality were introduced.

马生荣. 铁基粉末冶金齿轮件的感应热处理[J]. 粉末冶金工业, 2014, 24(06): 58-62.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 正时齿带轮粉末冶金模设计
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 闫 闵
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 青岛工学院，山东 胶州 266300
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 根据正时齿带轮的结构特点，设计了粉末冶金工艺的压模结构，论述了其工作原理。由于该齿带轮具有中心孔、内外台阶的特点，故采用补偿法装粉、浮动式压制、顶出式脱坯并配以辅助气缸的模具设计。实践证明，该模具结构合理，产品质量可靠，效果良好。但由于阴模有内台阶，要求粉末有稳定的松装比重。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Powder metallurgy die design for timing pulley
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the structure features of timing pulley, the powder metallurgy die structure was designed and its working principle was discussed. The timing pulley had the characteristics of center hole, inside and outside steps, so the compensation method was adopted for powder filling, and floating pressing, liftout demoulding with assistant cylinder were also employed. The practice had proved that the die structure is reasonable, product quality is reliable and effect is good. Because there are inner steps within the female die, it requires stable loose density for the powder.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
闫 闵. 正时齿带轮粉末冶金模设计[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 63-67.
YAN Min. Powder metallurgy die design for timing pulley. , 2014, 24(06): 63-67.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: SiC颗粒增强Al-Si基复合材料的国内研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 吴文杰， 王爱琴， 王荣旗， 谢敬佩
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 河南科技大学 材料科学与工程学院，河南 洛阳 471003
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 综述了SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料的发展历史和制备方法，重点阐述了SiC颗粒增强Al-Si基复合材料的国内研究现状，说明了SiC颗粒增强Al-Si基复合材料的优点及存在的主要问题，展望了其发展前景。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Domestic research progress of Al-Si matrix composites reinforced by SiC particles
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The development history and preparation methods of SiCp/Al composite were introduced, especially the domestic research situation for SiCp/Al-Si composite. The advantages and main problems of SiCp/Al-Si composite were illustrated and the development prospect of the composite was put forward.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
吴文杰， 王爱琴， 王荣旗， 谢敬佩. SiC颗粒增强Al-Si基复合材料的国内研究进展[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 54-57.
WU Wen-jie, WANG Ai-qin, WANG Rong-qi, XIE Jing-pei. Domestic research progress of Al-Si matrix composites reinforced by SiC particles. , 2014, 24(06): 54-57.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 热压烧结制备BN陶瓷复合材料的研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 刘 欢， 张 宁， 张天文， 阚洪敏， 王晓阳， 龙海波
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 沈阳大学 辽宁省先进材料制备技术重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110044
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了利用热压烧结制备h-BN复合陶瓷的工艺过程和致密化过程，分析了AlN/BN、Si3N4/BN和SiC/BN复合陶瓷在力学性能、耐热性能、加工性能和介电性能方面的影响因素，最后对BN复合陶瓷的未来发展趋势进行了展望。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research progress of boron nitride ceramic composite material produced by hot pressing
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The technological craft process and densification process of hexagonal boron nitride composite ceramic produced by hot pressing were reviewed. The factors affecting mechanical properties, heat resistance, processing properties and dielectric properties of AlN/BN, Si3N4/BN and SiC/BN composite ceramic were analyzed. Finally, the future development trend of boron nitride composite ceramic was previewed.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
刘 欢， 张 宁， 张天文， 阚洪敏， 王晓阳， 龙海波. 热压烧结制备BN陶瓷复合材料的研究进展[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 48-53.
LIU Huan, ZHANG Ning, ZHANG Tian-wen, KAN Hong-min,WANG Xiao-yang, LONG Hai-bo. Research progress of boron nitride ceramic composite material produced by hot pressing. , 2014, 24(06): 48-53.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 切削不同铸铁材料的PCBN超硬材料刀具磨损研究现状
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 李盼来， 张凤林， 白 坤
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 广东工业大学 机电工程学院，广东 广州 510006
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 基于聚晶立方氮化硼(PCBN)超硬材料刀具的高硬度、良好的耐磨性及化学稳定性，其在汽车制造领域的应用变得越来越广泛。对国内外学者们使用PCBN超硬材料刀具加工灰铸铁、球墨铸铁和蠕墨铸铁的研究现状进行总结分析，主要从刀具材料、工艺参数、工件材料、切削环境及加工方式等几个方面对PCBN超硬材料刀具切削加工3种铸铁时的磨损机制进行讨论，最后总结了切削不同种类铸铁材料时刀具的磨损情况。
keywords_cn: 关键词：PCBN刀具，切削，铸铁，刀具磨损
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research status on the wear of PCBN super-hard material cutting tool in machining different cast iron material
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Because of high hardness, good wear resistance and chemical stability, the application of PCBN super-hard material cutting tools in the field of automobile manufacturing is becoming more and more widely. Research status on the wear of PCBN cutting tool in machining gray cast iron, nodular cast iron and vermicular cast iron were summarized and analyzed. The wear?mechanisms of PCBN cutting tools in machining three kinds of cast iron were discussed mainly from several aspects, such as cutting tool material, process parameters, workpiece material, cutting conditions and processing way etc.. Finally, the wear situations of tools in cutting different types of cast iron were summarized.
keywords_en: Key words: PCBN tool, cutting, cast iron, wear mechanism
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
李盼来， 张凤林， 白 坤. 切削不同铸铁材料的PCBN超硬材料刀具磨损研究现状[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 42-47.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 制粉方式对粉末高温合金FGH98热变形特性的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 张国星1， 贾 建1,2， 陶 宇1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 钢铁研究总院 高温材料研究所，北京100081
2. 高温合金新材料北京市重点实验室，北京100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过等温恒应变速率压缩试验，研究了2种FGH98合金粉末热等静压锭坯在1 050～1 150 ℃/0.005～1.000 s-1的变形行为。基于动态材料模型，建立了2种粉末锭坯的热加工图。结果表明，2种粉末锭坯的流变曲线特征相似，同种变形条件下，氩气雾化（AA）粉末锭坯的峰值应力小于等离子旋转电极（PREP）粉末锭坯。AA粉末锭坯的最佳变形窗口为1 088～1 108 ℃/0.005~0.016 s-1，功率耗散效率[η]大于42%；PREP粉末锭坯的最佳变形窗口为1 098～1 120 ℃/0.010~0.016 s-1，[η]大于40%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of atomization method on the hot deformation behavior of PM superalloy FGH98
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The hot deformation behavior of as-HIPed PM superalloy FGH98 in the temperature range of 1 050-1 150 ℃ and strain rate range of 0.005~1.000 s-1 was investigated by using isothermal constant strain rate compressing tests. The powder was prepared with different atomization methods. On the basis of dynamic material modeling, processing maps for the two atomized billet were established. The results show that the rheological curves of the two kinds of billets are similar. Under the same deformation condition, the peak stress of argon gas atomization (AA) powder billet is lower than that of plasma rotating electrode process (PREP) powder billet. The optimum deformation window for AA powder billet is 1 088-1 108 ℃/0.005-0.016 s-1, the efficiency of power dissipation [η] is higher than 42%. But the optimum deformation window for PREP powder billet is 1 098-1 120 ℃/0.010-0.016 s-1, [η] is higher than 40%.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
张国星， 贾 建 ， 陶 宇. 制粉方式对粉末高温合金FGH98热变形特性的影响[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 16-22.
ZHANG Guo-xing, JIA Jian,, TAO Yu. Effect of atomization method on the hot deformation behavior of PM superalloy FGH98. , 2014, 24(06): 16-22.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 元素Cr对粉末冶金Ti-6Al-4V合金组织与性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 徐 坚1， 王文焱1,2， 张豪胤1， 谢敬佩1,2， 李洛利1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 河南科技大学 材料科学与工程学院，河南 洛阳471003
2. 河南省有色金属材料科学与加工技术重点实验室，河南 洛阳 471023
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用冷等静压、真空烧结的方法制备不同Cr含量的Ti-6Al-4V合金，通过金相观察、力学性能测试及SEM分析等方法研究Cr元素对Ti-6Al-4V合金显微组织与力学性能的影响。结果表明：添加Cr元素后，合金中并未出现化合物TiCr2，其组织是由(α+β)相组成的魏氏组织。Cr的添加降低了合金的致密度，提高了其抗压强度，当Cr质量分数为4%时，合金的抗压强度达到1 855 MPa。Cr质量分数为1%、2%时，合金断裂形式为韧性断裂；Cr含量为3%、4%时，合金断裂形式为解理断裂。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effects of Cr addition on microstructure and mechanical properties of powder metallurgy Ti-6Al-4V alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Ti-6Al-4V alloy with different Cr content was prepared by the method of cold isostatic pressing and vacuum sintering. The effect of Cr addition on the microstructure and mechanical properties of Ti-6Al-4V alloy was investigated using optical microscope, mechanical properties testing and scanning electron microscope. The results show that the compound TiCr2 does not appear in the alloy after adding Cr element, and the alloy is composed of (α+β) phase, which belongs to widmanstatten structure. The addition of Cr element makes the relative density of the alloy decrease and the compressive strength increase. The compressive strength of the alloy is 1 855 MPa when Cr content is 4wt%. The fracture mode of alloy is ductile fracture when Cr content is 1wt% and 2wt%; while the fracture mode turns to dissociative fracture when Cr content is 3wt% and 4wt%.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
徐 坚， 王文焱 ， 张豪胤， 谢敬佩 ， 李洛利. 元素Cr对粉末冶金Ti-6Al-4V合金组织与性能的影响[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 11-15.
XU Jian, WANG Wen-yan,, ZHANG Hao-yin, XIE Jing-pei,, LI Luo-li. Effects of Cr addition on microstructure and mechanical properties of powder metallurgy Ti-6Al-4V alloy. , 2014, 24(06): 11-15.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: SiC颗粒预处理对SiCp/Al-Si复合材料组织及性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 王荣旗， 谢敬佩， 吴文杰， 王爱琴
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 河南科技大学 材料科学与工程学院，河南 洛阳471003
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用高温焙烧加水洗工艺对SiC颗粒进行处理，用真空热压法制备SiC颗粒增强Al-Si基复合材料，研究了SiC预处理对复合材料微观组织和抗拉强度的影响。结果表明，经预处理的SiC颗粒增强Al-Si基复合材料界面结合良好，孔隙减少，相对密度和抗拉强度显著提高。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Influence of SiCp pretreatment on microstructure and performance of SiCp/Al-Si composite
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：SiC particles were pretreated by high temperature roasting and water washing process. SiCp/Al-25Si composite was prepared by vacuum hot pressing. The microstructure and tensile strength of the composite with pretreated or original SiC particles were studied. The results show that the SiCp/Al-25Si composite with pretreated SiC particles has higher interface bonding strength, less pores, and much higher relative density and tensile strength.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:

WANG Rong-qi, XIE Jing-pei, WU Wen-jie, WANG Ai-qin. Influence of SiCp pretreatment on microstructure and performance of SiCp/Al-Si composite. , 2014, 24(06): 33-36.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: Fe3Al及不锈钢多孔材料在含H2S气氛中的腐蚀试验研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 王 浩1,2， 杨军军1,2， 刘冠颖1,2， 王 凡1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 中国钢研科技集团有限公司 安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
2. 北京市特种粉末冶金材料工程技术研究中心，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 随着洁净煤技术在中国的快速发展，高温H2S环境下的除尘技术及材料得到越来越高的重视。测试并分析了Fe3Al及不锈钢多孔材料在H2S环境下的腐蚀增重及孔隙渗透性的变化，并采用扫描电镜观察腐蚀后的微观形貌，从而评价材料的耐蚀性能。结果表明：经过1 500 h试验， Fe3Al多孔材料在2%H2S（体积分数）浓度下具有优良的耐蚀性能；不锈钢材料耐蚀性较差，其产生的腐蚀产物容易堵塞孔隙，导致孔径与渗透性的大幅度下降。能谱分析与X射线衍射结果表明，Fe3Al表面基本未形成含S的腐蚀产物，而316L不锈钢表面形成了以FeS为主的含S腐蚀产物。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Experimental research on corrosion resistance of Fe3Al and stainless steel porous material in H2S-containing gas environment
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：With the rapid development of cleaning coal technology, more and more attention has been paid on the filtration technology and material in high temperature H2S environment. The mass and permeability change were tested for Fe3Al and stainless steel porous material in H2S environment. The results show that Fe3Al material has excellent corrosion resistance under 2vol% H2S content, while stainless steel porous material has worse corrosion resistance due to the blocked pore structure caused by corrosion product after 1 500 h experiment. Energy spectrum analysis and X-ray diffraction results show that the corrosion products containing sulfur does not form on the surface of Fe3Al, while the corrosion products based on FeS form on the surface of 316L stainless steel.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
王 浩 ， 杨军军 ， 刘冠颖 ， 王 凡 . Fe3Al及不锈钢多孔材料在含H2S气氛中的腐蚀试验研究[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 23-27.
WANG Hao,, YANG Jun-jun,, LIU Guan-ying,, WANG Fan,. Experimental research on corrosion resistance of Fe3Al and stainless steel porous material in H2S-containing gas environment. , 2014, 24(06): 23-27.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 放电等离子烧结法（SPS）制备Co-Mn复合材料的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 王冠仲， 张名涛， 郭平义
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 江苏科技大学 材料科学与工程学院，江苏 镇江212003
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用SPS烧结法在800 ℃、45 MPa下烧结32 min制得微观组织理想的Co-Mn复合材料，并结合烧结过程中出现的样品部分熔化及烧结孔缺陷等问题，简要引用分子运动学相关知识，重点探讨并分析SPS烧结理论与实际烧结过程的拟合程度，以达到完善SPS烧结理论在实际生产中应用的目的。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research on Co-Mn composite material prepared by spark plasma sintering (SPS) process
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The Co-Mn composite material with excellent microstructure was prepared by the method of spark plasma sintering (SPS) at 800 ℃/45 MPa for 32 min. Morphology and characteristics of the material were discussed. Furthermore, the fitting degree of the SPS theory and actual process combined with the problem of fuse zone and sintering hole defects were analyzed, which was related to theories of molecule kinetics. It aims at optimizing the SPS procedure for Co-Mn composite material preparation and promoting the application of SPS theory in practical production.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
王冠仲， 张名涛， 郭平义. 放电等离子烧结法（SPS）制备Co-Mn复合材料的研究[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 28-32.
WANG Guan-zhong, ZHANG Ming-tao, GUO Ping-yi. Research on Co-Mn composite material prepared by spark plasma sintering (SPS) process. , 2014, 24(06): 28-32.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 铁基粉末冶金气门导管烧结温度的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 刘 剑1， 宣天鹏1， 戴泽玉2， 袁 春2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 合肥工业大学 材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
2. 安徽金亿合金新材料有限公司，安徽 安庆 231431
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用2种常用的烧结温度制备Fe-Cu-C系气门导管，然后对其显微组织、密度、硬度和压溃强度进行测试。结果表明：相比于1 120 ℃烧结的试样，1 150 ℃烧结试样在高温区的脱碳更严重，珠光体数量减少，硬度降低，且高温会加速Cu的扩散，使孔隙增加，降低试样致密度。从组织性能、生产成本考虑，烧结温度以1 120 ℃为宜。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research on sintering temperature of iron-based PM vavle guide
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Fe-Cu-C vavle guide was prepared by powder metallurgy with two common sintering temperatures, and the microstructure, density, hardness and crushing strength of the samples were tested. The results show that decarburization at high temperature zone is more serious for the samples sintered at 1 150 ℃ compared to the samples sintered at 1 120 ℃, and the pearlite amount and hardness also decrease when sintered at 1 150 ℃. Furthermore, high temperature accelerates the diffusion of copper, leading to increased porosity and decreased density. In consideration of microstructure, properties and production costs, 1 120 ℃ is the suitable sintering temperature.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
刘 剑， 宣天鹏， 戴泽玉， 袁 春. 铁基粉末冶金气门导管烧结温度的研究[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 37-41.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 轧制钨板退火过程的织构衍变及性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 刘国辉1， 宋 鹏1， 吴 诚1， 秦思贵1， 弓艳飞1， 赵四祥2， 王承阳1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 安泰科技股份有限公司， 北京 100081
2. 中国科学院 等离子体物理研究所，安徽 合肥 230031
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以纯度(质量分数)为99.95%的钨粉为原料，经冷等静压成形，1 800～2 300 ℃高温烧结制得钨烧坯，钨烧坯在1 250～1 500 ℃经过4道次轧制制得接近理论密度的钨板。采用电子背散射衍射（EBSD）分析退火过程中钨板织构的衍变过程，通过金相、维氏硬度和高温抗拉强度分析退火过程中钨板组织和性能的变化规律。结果表明，轧制态的钨板晶粒组织明显沿轧制方向拉长；1 150 ℃和1 250 ℃退火10 min后，织构类型没有发生明显变化，晶粒仍为拉长状态；1 350 ℃退火后，形变织构明显减弱，晶粒取向分布趋于随机。通过统计面积分数分析得到，1 350 ℃退火后钨板晶粒再结晶组织比例占65.8%。轧制钨板的显微硬度和高温抗拉强度随退火温度的升高而降低，1 150 ℃退火后的显微硬度和高温抗拉强度分别为430 HV和485 MPa，1 350 ℃退火后的显微硬度和高温抗拉强度分别为410 HV和356 MPa。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Texture evolution and performance of the rolling tungsten plate during annealing process
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The tungsten powder with 99.95wt% purity was pressed by CIP method and sintered at 1 800～2 300 ℃ in H2 atmosphere. The sintered tungsten billet was rolled 4 passes at 1 250～1 500 ℃, the tungsten plate with density close to theoretical value was achieved. The texture evolution of tungsten plate during the annealing process was observed by electron backscattered diffraction (EBSD) analysis. High temperature tensile strength and Vickers hardness of the tungsten plate were also tested to investigate the microstructure and properties development during the annealing process. The results show that the tungsten grain stretches along the rolling direction obviously after rolling process and there is no obvious texture change when annealed at 1 150 ℃ and 1 250 ℃ for 10 min. The deformation texture of tungsten plate is decreased and the tungsten grain orientation tends to be random after annealed at 1 350 ℃. The recrystallization ratio of tungsten grain is 65.8% calculated by statistical analysis of the area fraction. The high temperature tensile strength and Vickers hardness decrease with the annealing temperature increasing from 1 150 ℃ to 1 350 ℃. The high temperature tensile strength at 1 000 ℃ is 485 MPa and 356 MPa, respectively. The Vickers hardness is 430 HV and 410 HV, respectively.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
刘国辉， 宋 鹏， 吴 诚， 秦思贵， 弓艳飞， 赵四祥， 王承阳. 轧制钨板退火过程的织构衍变及性能研究[J]. , 2014, 24(06): 6-10.
LIU Guo-hui, SONG Peng, WU Cheng, QIN Si-gui, GONG Yan-fei, ZHAO Si-xiang, WANG Cheng-yang. Texture evolution and performance of the rolling tungsten plate during annealing process. , 2014, 24(06): 6-10.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 粉末冶金零件生产用润滑剂的性能改进与选择
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 韩凤麟
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 中国机协粉末冶金分会，北京 100825
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在粉末冶金零件生产中，压制成形与脱模过程中都需要进行润滑，最常用的方法是将润滑剂添加于金属粉末的预混合粉中。润滑剂的类型不仅影响粉末的压制性能，而且影响混合粉的其他性能和零件的生坯与烧结性能。评述了最常用的润滑剂的使用性能，并介绍最近20多年来粘结剂/润滑剂系统的性能改进与进展。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: The performance improvement and selection of lubricant for production of PM components
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In the production of PM components, admixed lubricant in the metal powder mix is the most common way to achieve the lubrication needed during compaction and ejection of the components. However, the type of lubricant not only influences the compaction, but also the properties of the powder mix as well as the properties of the green component and sintered parts. The most commonly used lubricants were reviewed, and the advances in binder/lubricant systems in the past two decades were introduced.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
韩凤麟. 粉末冶金零件生产用润滑剂的性能改进与选择[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 1-7.
HAN Feng-lin. The performance improvement and selection of lubricant for production of PM components. , 2015, 25(02): 1-7.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 磁粉离合器用新型磁性合金粉末的研发和应用评估
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 王 峻，卢广锋，于金霞，刘 钢
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 磁粉是磁粉离合器（MPC）及制动器最关键的部件。采用气雾化工艺制备一种新成分磁粉，并对其耐氧化性和失效机理进行初步探讨。静态检测表明，新磁粉具有优异的物理性能和高温磁稳定性；动态测试中，磁粉表现出输出扭矩高、耐热性好等特点。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research and application evaluation of new magnetic alloy powder for MPC
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Magnetic alloy powder is the most important factor in magnetic particle clutches and brakes. A new magnetic alloy powder was prepared by gas atomization process, the oxidation resistance and failure mechanism of the powder was discussed. The static testing shows that the new magnetic powder has good physical characters and high temperature magnetic stability; while the dynamic testing shows that the powder has high output torque and good heat resistance.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
王 峻，卢广锋，于金霞，刘 钢. 磁粉离合器用新型磁性合金粉末的研发和应用评估[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 12-19.
WANG Jun, LU Guang-feng, YU Jin-xia, LIU Gang. Research and application evaluation of new magnetic alloy powder for MPC. , 2015, 25(02): 12-19.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 高压扭转半径对SiCp/Al基复合材料组织和硬度的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 林俐菁，王成国，李 萍，乔 硕
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: SiCp/Al复合材料由于耐磨性好、比强度高、热膨胀系数小等优点而广泛应用于航空航天、汽车工业等众多领域。利用高压扭转法制备SiCp/Al复合材料，通过硬度测试和扫描电子显微镜观察金相组织，分析研究不同高压扭转半径对SiCp/Al复合材料组织和硬度的影响。结果表明，随着扭转半径的增大，剪切作用不断增强，等效应变增大，颗粒团聚现象减少，SiC颗粒分布均匀性增加，试样的显微硬度逐渐提高。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of torsion radius on the microstructure and hardness of SiCp/Al composite produced by high pressure torsion
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：SiCp/Al composites have a widespread use in the field of aerospace, automobile and so on, because of their good wear resistance, high specific strength and low coefficient of thermal expansion. High pressure torsion (HPT) was used to prepare SiCp/Al composites. The influence of torsion radius on the microstructure and hardness of the composite was investigated. The results show that the shear strengthening and equivalent strain increase, the particle agglomeration decreases, the distribution of SiC is more uniform and the micro-hardness of the composite increases with the increasing of torsion radius.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
林俐菁，王成国，李 萍，乔 硕. 高压扭转半径对SiCp/Al基复合材料组织和硬度的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 35-38.
LIN Li-jing, WANG Cheng-guo, Li Ping, QIAO Shuo. Effect of torsion radius on the microstructure and hardness of SiCp/Al composite produced by high pressure torsion. , 2015, 25(02): 35-38.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 高压水雾化法制备MIM不锈钢粉末工艺研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 冷 丹，曾克里，王志勇，宋信强，朱 杰，田学娜
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 广州有色金属研究院，广东 广州 510650
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用水雾化法制备不锈钢粉末，并研究了漏嘴内径和雾化压力对粉末形貌、氧含量、粉末粒度分布以及振实密度的影响。采用激光粒度分析仪、扫描电子显微镜对样品进行表征。结果表明：当水雾化压力为115 MPa、漏嘴内径为3.5 mm时，可制备出平均粒径较小且分布均匀([D50]为8.83 μm，[D90]为20.80 μm)，氧含量较低，振实密度高的不锈钢细粉。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Study on the preparation process of MIM stainless steel powder by high pressure water atomization method
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Stainless steel powder was prepared by high pressure water atomization method. The influences of nozzle diameter and water pressure on the morphology, oxygen content, particle size distribution and tap density of powder were investigated. The microstructure and properties of samples were characterized by means of laser particle size analyzer, scanning electronic microscope, etc. The results indicate that, the stainless steel powder has small average particle size ([D50] is 8.83 μm, [D90] is 20.80 μm), uniform particle size distribution, low oxygen content and high tap density when the water pressure is 115 MPa and the nozzle diameter is 3.5 mm.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
冷 丹，曾克里，王志勇，宋信强，朱 杰，田学娜. 高压水雾化法制备MIM不锈钢粉末工艺研究[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 8-11.
LENG Dan, ZENG Ke-li, WANG Zhi-yong, SONG Xin-qiang, ZHU Jie, TIAN Xue-na. Study on the preparation process of MIM stainless steel powder by high pressure water atomization method. , 2015, 25(02): 8-11.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 熔铸法制备Al2O3/金属复合涂层微观组织的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 薛小锋，王泽华，周泽华，邵 佳
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 河海大学力学与材料学院，江苏 南京 210098
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用Fe2O3+Cr2O3+Al和NiO+Al双层预涂覆结构，利用自蔓延熔铸法在碳钢基体上制备Al2O3/金属复合涂层，研究涂层与基体结合界面处的微观形貌、结合状态、涂层组织以及元素的分布。结果表明：涂层由α-Al2O3、Fe-Ni、Cr、AlNi3、Fe-Cr组成；复合涂层与基体紧密结合，无明显的缝隙或者孔洞存在，在界面处存在明显的元素扩散；涂层中主要有等轴晶、柱状晶、树枝晶以及板条状组织，各元素在界面处分布较均匀，但在涂层中部，金属元素发生了偏聚；延长保温时间，金属元素的偏聚程度加剧。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research on microstructure of alumina/metal coating prepared by melting-casting
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A sort of alumina/metal coating characterized by a bi-layered structure of Fe2O3+Cr2O3+Al plus NiO+Al layers, was successfully prepared on steel substrate by melting-casting technique. The microstructure, bonding status of the interface between the coating and the substrate, and the element distribution of the coating were studied. Results indicate that the coating is composed of α-Al2O3, Fe-Ni, Cr, AlNi3 and Fe-Cr. There is an excellent bonding between the coating and the substrate, and no hole or gap is found in the composite. Moreover, there is obvious element diffusion in the interface. The coating is composed of equiaxed grain, columnar grain, dendrites and lath phase. The elements present a uniform distribution in the interface but an obvious segregation in the middle of the coating. The segregation degree of metal elements is strengthened when extending the holding time.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
薛小锋，王泽华，周泽华，邵 佳. 熔铸法制备Al2O3/金属复合涂层微观组织的研究[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 39-45.
XUE Xiao-feng, WANG Ze-hua, ZHOU Ze-hua, SHAO Jia. Research on microstructure of alumina/metal coating prepared by melting-casting. , 2015, 25(02): 39-45.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 孔密度和孔隙率对泡沫铜换热性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 刘汉强，赵 鹏，浦玉萍，沈 伟，朱黎冉
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 钢铁研究总院， 北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用超声波辅助电沉积工艺制备了9种不同孔结构的泡沫铜，研究了水工质、层流-紊流转捩状态下（0.4～1.3 m/s）泡沫铜的孔密度和孔隙率对换热性能的影响。结果表明：相同孔隙率，孔密度从10 ppi增大到45 ppi时，泡沫铜的黏性系数[K1]和惯性系数[K2]分别降低约80%和50%，努赛尔数[Nu]提高了约1.0倍；相同孔密度，孔隙率从96%降低到90%时，泡沫铜的[K1]和[K2]分别降低约30%和20%，[Nu]提高了约0.5倍；10 ppi孔密度、96%孔隙率的泡沫铜具有最优的综合性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Influence of pore density and porosity on heat transfer performance of copper foam
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Copper foams with nine different cell structural parameters were prepared by ultrasonic assisted electrodeposition process. The viscosity coefficient [K1], inertia coefficient [K2] and nusselt number [Nu] of copper foams were tested using water as working fluid in laminar -turbulent transition region (0.4～1.3 m/s). The influence of pore density and porosity of copper foams on flow, convective heat transfer and overall performance was discussed. Results show that [K1] and [K2] decrease by about 80% and 50%, and the [Nu] increases by about 100% when pore density increases from 10 ppi to 45 ppi at the same porosity, while [K1] and [K2] decrease by about 30% and 20%, and[Nu]increases by about 50% when porosity decreases from 96% to 90% at the same pore density. From the view point of overall performance, copper foam with pore density of 10 ppi, 96% porosity is a clear optimum.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
刘汉强，赵 鹏，浦玉萍，沈 伟，朱黎冉. 孔密度和孔隙率对泡沫铜换热性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 46-51.
LIU Han-qiang, ZHAO Peng, PU Yu-ping, SHEN Wei, ZHU Li-ran. Influence of pore density and porosity on heat transfer performance of copper foam. , 2015, 25(02): 46-51.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 微细Cr-Fe合金粉对粉末冶金钢组织与性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 牟 楠1，雷龙林2，徐 然1，唐 琳2，罗丰华1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 中南大学粉末冶金国家重点实验室，湖南 长沙 410083
2. 宁波方太厨具有限公司, 浙江 宁波 315336
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在Fe-0.5Mo预合金粉末中加入平均粒径为4.65 μm的FeCr55C600高碳Cr-Fe合金粉末，于1 200 ℃，采用烧结硬化工艺制备Fe-Cr-Mo粉末冶金合金钢。结果表明：随着Cr-Fe合金粉末量的增加，合金烧结试样的硬度增加，强度增加，合金的显微组织以贝氏体为主。当添加微细颗粒的Cr-Fe合金粉末，使Cr质量分数达到1.7%时，合金烧结试样的综合性能达到最优，抗拉强度为1 210 MPa，硬度为30 HRC，显微组织主要为细小的下贝氏体和马氏体，此时合金中Cr/C质量比约为1.54。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of the fine Cr-Fe alloy powder on the microstructure and properties of powder metallurgy steels
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The Fe-Cr-Mo PM steel was obtained from the mixed FeCr55C600 high carbon ferrochrome powders with a mean particle size of 4.65 μm and the Fe-0.5Mo water atomized pre-alloyed powders, sintered at 1 200℃ by sinter hardening process. The results indicate that the hardness and strength of the sintered alloys increase as the content of Cr-Fe alloy powder increasing. The microstructure of the sintered specimens is mainly composed of bainite. When adding ultrafine Cr-Fe alloy powder, leading to the Cr mass content of 1.7%, Fe-Cr-Mo PM steels have optimal properties, with tensile strength of 1 210 MPa and hardness of 30 HRC. Main microstructure of the alloy is a mixture of fine lower bainite and martensite, and mass ratio of the alloy element of Cr/C is about 1.54.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
牟 楠，雷龙林，徐 然，唐 琳，罗丰华. 微细Cr-Fe合金粉对粉末冶金钢组织与性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 25-30.
MOU Nan, LEI Long-lin, XU Ran, TANG Lin, LUO Feng-hua. Effect of the fine Cr-Fe alloy powder on the microstructure and properties of powder metallurgy steels. , 2015, 25(02): 25-30.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 凝胶注模-真空烧结制备TiC/Fe基钢结硬质合金
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 石永亮1，郭志猛2，李秀敏1，杨晓彩1，戚翠芬1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 河北工业职业技术学院材料工程系，河北 石家庄 050091
2. 北京科技大学新材料技术研究院，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用甲苯/甲基丙烯酸羟乙酯（HEMA）凝胶体系实现了TiC/Fe基复合粉末的凝胶注模成形，并通过真空烧结制备出复杂形状的钢结合金烧结体，研究了单体含量对坯体和烧结体抗弯强度、密度、硬度及微观组织的影响。结果表明：单体含量直接影响坯体及烧结体的组织及性能，单体的最佳质量分数为4.6%，制备的坯体强度高达28 MPa，经1 420 ℃真空烧结1 h，制备出烧结体的强度、密度及硬度分别为1 410 MPa、6.46 g/cm3、50 HRC，热处理后，制品的抗弯强度及硬度分别提高到1 670 MPa和65 HRC。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Gelcasting and vacuum sintering process of TiC/Fe steel bonded carbide
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Gelcasting in methylbenzene/HEMA system was successfully employed to manufacture TiC/Fe cemented carbide with complex shape. The effects of monomer content on the structure, density and strength of green and sintered body were analyzed. The results show that the monomer content is the key factor in TiC/Fe gelcasting process. The optimum monomer (HEMA) content is 4.6% (based on the mass of powder). With the optimum monomer content, the green strength is 28 MPa. When vacuum sintered at 1 420 ℃ for 1 h, the transverse rupture strength, density and hardness of specimens are 1 410 MPa, 6.46 g/cm3 and 50 HRC, respectively. The transverse rupture strength and hardness reach 1 670 MPa and 65 HRC after heat treatment.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
石永亮，郭志猛，李秀敏，杨晓彩，戚翠芬. 凝胶注模-真空烧结制备TiC/Fe基钢结硬质合金[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 20-24.
SHI Yong-liang, GUO Zhi-meng, LI Xiu-min, YANG Xiao-cai, QI Cui-fen. Gelcasting and vacuum sintering process of TiC/Fe steel bonded carbide. , 2015, 25(02): 20-24.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: Al2O3含量对碳纳米管增强Cu基复合材料性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 崔照雯，蒋立坤，刘建金，贾成厂
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 北京科技大学新材料技术研究院，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用机械合金化法（MA）、磁力搅拌法（MS）、放电等离子烧结工艺(SPS)制备材料样品，研究了Al2O3含量对碳纳米管(CNTs)增强Cu基复合材料性能的影响。结果表明，加入Al2O3与碳纳米管增强相后的Cu基复合材料与纯Cu相比，磨损率降低了70.9%～85.7%，维氏硬度提高了11.6%～24.5%。当添加1.0%CNTs和1.6%Al2O3（质量分数）时所制备的复合材料的综合性能最优：相对密度为97.5%，维氏硬度为75.2 HV，热导率为272.45 W/(m·K)，电导率为4.39×107 Ω－1·m－1。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Influence of Al2O3 content on the properties of CNTs reinforced copper matrix composites
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：By employing the combination of mechanical alloying (MA), magnetic stirring process (MS) and spark plasma sintering (SPS) process, the influence of Al2O3 content on the properties of carbon nanotubes (CNTs) reinforced copper matrix composites was studied. Results show that wear rate of the composite is reduced by 70.9%-85.7% and Vickers hardness is increased by 11.6%-24.5% compared with pure copper. The copper matrix composite has the best comprehensive properties when adding 1.0% CNTs and 1.6%Al2O3 (mass percent), showing the relative density of 97.5%, Vickers hardness of 75.2 HV, thermal conductivity of 272.45 W/(m·K), and electrical conductivity of 4.39×107 Ω-1·m-1.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
崔照雯，蒋立坤，刘建金，贾成厂. Al2O3含量对碳纳米管增强Cu基复合材料性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(02): 31-34.
CUI Zhao-wen, JIANG Li-kun, LIU Jian-jin, JIA Cheng-chang. Influence of Al2O3 content on the properties of CNTs reinforced copper matrix composites. , 2015, 25(02): 31-34.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: BN-AlN复合陶瓷的制备与性能研究现状
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 刘 欢，张 宁，张天文，阚洪敏，王晓阳，龙海波
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 沈阳大学辽宁省先进材料制备技术重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110044
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了BN-AlN复合陶瓷的几种常见的制备方法，同时对BN-AlN复合陶瓷的性能研究现状进行了论述，最后对BN-AlN复合陶瓷的未来发展进行了展望。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Research status of preparation and properties of BN-AlN composite ceramics
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Several preparation methods of BN-AlN composite ceramics were introduced, and the research status on the performance of BN-AlN composite ceramics was discussed. Then, the future development trend of BN-AlN composite ceramics was previewed.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 目前广泛使用的硬脂酸锌和EBS蜡（N,N’-乙撑双硬脂酰胺）等内添润滑剂，是可以稳定生产生坯密度6.8～7.1 g/cm3 的零件的润滑剂，但是，在要求生坯密度大于7.2 g/cm3的成形条件下，往往会润滑性不足，导致模具异常磨损，模具寿命降低，压坯不合格率提高。研究了新型蜡性润滑剂(艾迪科新型蜡基润滑剂)的基本性能，采用内添润滑剂方式可以稳定连续生产生坯密度7.2 g/cm3以上的高密度零件。
keywords_cn: 粉末冶金润滑剂 高密度润滑剂 冷压高密度润滑剂
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Development of internally added lubricant for high-density compaction
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Now widely used internal lubricant, such as zinc stearate and EBS wax (N,N，-ethylenebis[stearamide]),are suitable for the stable production of PM parts with green density of 6.8-7.1 g/cm3. However, these lubricants are often lack of lubrication in the?production of parts with green density higher than 7.2 g/cm3, leading to abnormal wear and decreased service life of the mold, and increased defective rate. Basic performance of new developed wax lubricant (Adeka new developed wax lubricannt) was summarized.The results show that the new lubricant can be used in the stable and continuous production of high density parts with green density higher than 7.2 g/cm3.

KYOUSHI Adachi, YUUKOU Mizuno, ZENG Rui. Development of internally added lubricant for high-density compaction. , 2015, 25(02): 70-73.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 俄罗斯新型粉末高温合金研制进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 张义文1,2，迟 悦1, 2，刘建涛1, 2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 钢铁研究总院高温材料研究所，北京 100081
2. 高温合金新材料北京市重点试验室，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了俄罗斯为第5代、第5代半(俄罗斯划分)航空发动机研制的新型ВВП系(ВВ750П、ВВ751П、ВВ752П、ВВ753П)粉末高温合金的最新进展。俄罗斯采用等离子旋转电极法(PREP)制粉＋直接热等静压(As-HIP)成形工艺制造粉末高温合金盘件。ВВП系粉末高温合金的抗拉强度、650 ℃下的持久强度以及低周疲劳性能均优于ЭП741НП合金，但塑性、韧性低于ЭП741НП合金。ВВП系合金盘件性能满足第5代、第5代半航空发动机的设计要求。其中，ВВ751П和ВВ752П属于高强型合金，可用于工作温度为650～700 ℃的盘件等；ВВ750П和ВВ753П属于高热强型合金，可用于工作温度在750 ℃以上的盘件等。俄罗斯已开始工业试制批生产和提供航空发动机涡轮和压气机用ВВ750П合金盘件；ВВ751П合金盘件等已用于发动机ПД14和РД-133；ВВ752П和ВВ753П合金盘件处于试制阶段。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Recent development of new type powder metallurgy superalloys in Russia
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The latest development of new type BBП series(ВВ750П, ВВ751П, ВВ752П and ВВ753П) powder metallurgy(PM) superalloy designed for the fifth generation and fifth-and-one-half generation of aircraft engine (Russia division) were introduced. The PM superalloy discs are produced by directly hot isostatic pressing powders atomized by plasma rotating electrode process (PREP). The mechanical properties of BBП series PM superalloys, such as tensile strength, endurance strength at 650 ℃ and low cycle fatigue life are superior to those of ЭП741НП PM superalloy, while the plasticity and toughness of BBП series PM superalloys are inferior to those of ЭП741НП PM superalloy. BBП series PM superalloys components such as turbine discs meet the design requirements of the fifth generation and fifth-and-one-half generation of aircraft engine in Russia. The ВВ751П and ВВ752П superalloys has sound strength, and can be used as hot section components, such as turbine disc, which working at 650-700 ℃. The ВВ750П and ВВ753П PM superalloys has sound strength at higher temperature, and can be used as hot section components, such as turbine disc, which working above 750 ℃. In Russia, ВВ750П superalloys discs for turbine and compressor are in industrial batch production stage, ВВ751П superalloys discs have been applied in ПД14 and РД-133 engines, while the discs of ВВ752П and ВВ753П superalloys are presently in trial manufacturing stage.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
张义文 ，迟 悦 ，刘建涛 . 俄罗斯新型粉末高温合金研制进展[J]. , 2015, 25(04): 1-14.
ZHANG Yi-wen, ,CHI Yue, ,LIU Jian-tao, . Recent development of new type powder metallurgy superalloys in Russia. , 2015, 25(04): 1-14.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 生物3D打印的最新研究及应用

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 上海应用技术学院机械工程学院，上海 201418
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 生物3D打印是生物制造的重要技术手段，是制造学从使用单一结构材料、功能材料，到使用生物材料和生命体材料的拓展延伸，也是工程、材料、信息和生命科学等多学科的交叉融合。介绍了生物3D打印技术的概念、特点及应用，对目前快速发展的细胞打印、器官打印技术进行重点阐述，同时介绍了生物3D打印技术的最新发展趋势。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: New research and applications of bio-3D printing
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Bio-3D printing is an important bio-manufacturing technique, which is the extension of manufacturing from using single structural materials and functional materials to using biological materials and life materials, but also the cross-integration of engineering, materials, information, life sciences and other disciplines. The concept, features and applications of biological 3D printing technology were introduced. The rapid developing cell printing and organ printing technology were described with emphasis, and the latest development trends in biological 3D printing technology was introduced.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 热挤压对SiC/2024Al复合材料性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 户志勇1，兖利鹏2，王爱琴3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 中国空空导弹研究院，河南 洛阳 471099
2. 河南机电高等专科学校材料工程系，河南 新乡 453003
3. 河南科技大学材料科学与工程学院，河南 洛阳 471099
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用冷压烧结工艺制备35%SiC/2024Al基（质量分数）复合材料，对烧结后的试样进行热挤压二次成形。利用金相显微镜、透射电镜（TEM）观察热挤压前后材料的微观组织，检测复合材料的物理和力学性能，研究热挤压前后SiC颗粒的分布特征、基体晶粒变化情况以及复合材料的强化机理。结果表明：挤压后的SiC颗粒偏聚现象减少，分布更加均匀，具有一定的“流向”性；挤压后的基体晶粒发生明显的细化；复合材料的致密度和抗拉强度得到明显的提高。
keywords_cn: SiC/2024 Al基复合材料，热挤压，致密度，抗拉强度，强化机理
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of hot extrusion on properties of SiC/2024Al composites
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The 35%SiC/2024Al (mass percent) composite was prepared by cold pressing and sintering, and then the specimen was hot-extruded. The microstructure of the material was observed by optical microscope and TEM, the physical and mechanical properties were also tested. The distribution characteristic of SiC particles, change of grains in matrix and the strengthening mechanism of the composite were investigated. The results show that the distribution of SiC particles is more uniform and the segregation decreases after hot-extrusion. The arrangement of SiC particles in the direction of extrusion is more oriental and orderly. The grains of the composite are refined. The densities and tensile strength are increased significantly after hot-extrusion.
keywords_en: SiC/2024Al composites, hot extrusion, densification, tensile strength, strengthening mechanism
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
户志勇，兖利鹏，王爱琴. 热挤压对SiC/2024Al复合材料性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(04): 26-29.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 韩 帅，赵麦群，王子逾，李少萌
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 西安理工大学材料科学与工程学院， 陕西 西安 710048
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用超音速气雾化装置制备了Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu无铅焊锡粉末，用扫描电子显微镜和激光粒度分析仪对粉末的微观形貌和粒度分布进行表征，并提出一种反应质量差法计算粉末的氧含量，分析了雾化气体压力对粉末有效雾化率、微观形貌、粒度分布以及氧化程度的影响。结果表明：雾化气体压力对粉末的有效雾化率、微观形貌、粒度分布影响较大。粉末的有效雾化率随雾化气体压力的增加而不断提高；相对高的气压下粉末球形度好，0.6 MPa压力下雾化粉末的球形度好且无团聚；随着雾化气体压力的增大，粉末不断细化，且随着雾化压力的提高，粉末粒度减小幅度逐渐变缓；粉末中的氧含量随雾化气体压力的增大略有增加，高的氧含量使粉末表面粗糙度增大。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effects of gas atomization pressure on the characteristics of Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu lead-free solder powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu lead-free solder powders were prepared by supersonic gas atomization equipment. The scanning electron microscope and laser particle size analyzer were used to characterize the microstructure and size distribution of the powder, respectively. The method of mass difference after reaction between solder powders was used to calculate the oxygen content of powders. The effects of gas pressure on the effective atomization rate, powder microstructure, size distribution and oxygen content were investigated. The results indicate that the gas pressure has great influence on the effective atomization rate, powder microstructure and size distribution of the powders. The effective atomization rate increases with the gas pressure increasing. The sphericity of the powders is better under higher gas pressure, while it is best when the gas pressure is 0.6 MPa. The powder size becomes smaller as the gas pressure increasing, which decreases slowly under higher pressure. The oxygen content of the powders increases slightly with the gas pressure increasing, causing bad powder surface.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
韩 帅，赵麦群，王子逾，李少萌. 雾化气体压力对Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu焊锡粉末特性的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(04): 20-25.
HAN Shuai,ZHAO Mai-qun,WANG Zi-yu,LI Shao-meng. Effects of gas atomization pressure on the characteristics of Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu lead-free solder powder. , 2015, 25(04): 20-25.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: WC材料和器件强韧化的工艺技术研究

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在WC粉末中加入Ni、Al粉末，采用粉末冶金工艺，经过液相烧结，反应合成Ni3Al粘结相，制成WC-Ni3Al硬质复合材料及器件，具有较高的强韧性和抗氧化性，有重要的工业应用前景。
keywords_cn: 碳化钨复合材料、反应合成、粉末冶金
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Strengthening and toughening technology research of tungsten carbide materials and apparatus
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The Ni and Al powder was added into WC powder, the Ni3Al binder phase was synthesized through liquid phase sintering by powder metallurgy process. WC-Ni3Al hard composite materials and apparatus with binder phase of Ni3Al have high strength, toughness and oxidation resistance, which have important industrial application prospect.
keywords_en: WC - Ni3Al hard composite reaction synthesis powder metallurgy

YU Chao-qing,YI Li,LIU Xue-mei,REN Xiao-mei,HE Xiao-lin,HE Jiao. Strengthening and toughening technology research of tungsten carbide materials and apparatus. , 2015, 25(04): 42-46.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 等径角挤压工艺路径对铝粉烧结体微观组织的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 华 睿，李 萍，薛克敏，宋群超
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院， 安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用金相电子显微镜、透射电镜观察及有限元模拟等分析手段，研究了等径角挤压工艺路径（A、BC和C路径）对铝粉烧结体微观组织和晶粒细化效果的影响。结果表明：BC路径变形后试样组织均匀性好，晶粒细化效果明显。其组织内部位错滑移的产生，除了受材料晶体结构特征的影响，多道次累积变形过程中剪切外力与晶粒间的取向关系也是关键所在。在等径角挤压强烈的剪切作用下，初始无序分布的晶粒会呈现单一的取向性，当多道次累积变形相邻道次剪切面夹角接近金属滑移系易于开动的软取向时，组织内部的位错滑移增加。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of equal channel angular pressing routes on microstructure of sintered aluminum powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of equal channel angular pressing (ECAP) routes (A, BC and C route) on the microstructure and grain refinement of sintered aluminum powder was studied through optical microscope, transmission electron microscope and finite element simulation. The results show that BC route is the best one to optimize sintered aluminum powder, which refines grain size effectively, and the microstructure distribution uniformity of aluminum powder is improved. The forming of dislocation slipping can be attributed to the characteristics of crystalline structure and the relationship between the shear force during the accumulated deformation and the grains orientation. After the severe shearing of ECAP, the disorderly distribution of the initial grains shows a single orientation. When the value of adjacent shear planes angle closes to the soft orientation of metal slip system moved easily, the occurrence of dislocation slip is increased.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
华 睿，李 萍，薛克敏，宋群超. 等径角挤压工艺路径对铝粉烧结体微观组织的影响[J]. , 2015, 25(04): 30-35.
HUA Rui, LI Ping, XUE Ke-min, SONG Qun-chao. Effect of equal channel angular pressing routes on microstructure of sintered aluminum powder. , 2015, 25(04): 30-35.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 模压成形和注射成形钼端帽对比研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 朱 武，侯海涛，江祺锋，郑春财

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 分别采用模压成形和注射成形工艺制备钼端帽，系统分析两者之间的差异，为后续工艺设计提供借鉴。研究结果表明：在外观、焊接强度、端帽强度方面，模压成形钼端帽要优于注射成形钼端帽；尺寸控制方面，模压成形和注射成形各有所长。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Comparative study of?molybdenum caps made by die forming?and MIM
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Differences between the molybdenum?caps prepared by die forming and MIM were studied systematically, to provide reference?for the following?process design. The results indicate that the molybdenum?caps made by die forming are better than those made by MIM on the aspects of appearance，welding strength and cap strength, while die forming and MIM both has its good points on size control.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The fundamental and related theory for combustion synthesis of ferrovanadium nitride was studied. http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 多元陶瓷增强铜基复合材料的摩擦磨损性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 曾昭锋
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 郧阳师范高等专科学校，湖北 十堰 442000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以6-6-3青铜粉为基体，加入SiC、Si3N4、B4C多元陶瓷作为颗粒增强相，利用粉末冶金法通过真空烧结工艺制备了SiC、Si3N4、B4C多元陶瓷/铜基复合材料，在MRH-3型高速环块磨损试验机上研究了复合材料在不同温度下的摩擦磨损性能。分析了SiC、Si3N4、B4C多元陶瓷增强相含量对复合材料耐磨性能、摩擦系数以及热导率的影响。结果表明：SiC、Si3N4、B4C多元陶瓷/铜复合材料在耐热性能、耐磨性能、抗弯强度等方面性能优异；多元陶瓷质量分数分别为15%、25%、35%的多元陶瓷/铜基复合材料中，硬度、抗弯强度以及耐磨性能均随着陶瓷颗粒质量分数的增加先提高后降低；摩擦系数先减小后增大，基本稳定在0.49左右，受温度影响波动不大；陶瓷颗粒的加入对材料的导热性能有一定影响，从而影响耐磨性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Study on friction and wear properties of multivariate ceramics/Cu composite
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Copper-matrix friction material with SiC, Si3N4 and B4C multivariate ceramic particles was fabricated by powder metallurgy through vacuum sintering technology. Wear resistance of the composites were studied on MRH-3 wear testing machine. The effect of SiC, Si3N4 and B4C multivariate ceramic was studied. The results show that the composites have high heat resistance, wear resistance and bending strength, etc. Hardness, bending strength and wear resistance of the composite increase firstly and then decrease with the ceramic particles content increasing when the mass percent of ceramic is 15%, 25% and 35%. The friction coefficient is stable at around 0.49, which is not affected apparently by temperature fluctuations. The addition of ceramic particles has some influence on the thermal conductivity, thus the wear resistance is also affected.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.citation:
曾昭锋. 多元陶瓷增强铜基复合材料的摩擦磨损性能[J]. , 2015, 25(04): 36-41.
ZENG Zhao-feng. Study on friction and wear properties of multivariate ceramics/Cu composite. , 2015, 25(04): 36-41.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_cn: 雾化室内气压对Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu焊锡粉末雾化过程的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.author_cn: 王子逾，赵麦群，韩 帅，吴道子，赵 振
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.org_cn: 西安理工大学材料科学与工程学院，陕西 西安 710048
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用超音速气雾化装置制备了Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu无铅焊锡粉末，研究了雾化室内不同气压状态对粉末雾化过程的影响。结果表明：随着雾化室内部气压的逐渐增大，锥形雾化区由稳定逐渐趋于紊乱，锥形雾化区范围逐渐变大，气液流量比也随之增大，粉末球形度先变好后变差。当雾化室内部气压为0.05 MPa时，锥形雾化区稳定且雾化区范围大，粉末球形度最好。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.title_en: Effect of atomizing chamber pressure on the atomization process of Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu solder powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_fmyjgy/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The Sn0.3Ag0.7Cu lead-free solder powder was prepared with supersonic gas atomization device to study the effects of different pressure states inside the atomization chamber on the atomization process of powder. The results show that conical atomization area tends to disorder from stable state with the atomizing chamber pressure increasing, moreover, the conical atomization area becomes larger gradually, gas-liquid flow ratio also increases, and the sphericity degree of atomized powder becomes better firstly and then worse. When the pressure inside the chamber is 0.05 MPa, the conical atomization area is stable and has large area, the sphericity degree of atomized powder is the best.
